name: Pew Pew Pew (Lazy Solutions, robbibb123, Zumwani)
name_original: Pew Pew Pew (Lazy Solutions, robbibb123, Zumwani)
description:
Game jams provide a good way for us to test out our own assets, and to see if we still got what it takes to finish a project.

As it did not turn out as chaotic as first planned, we did have a very relaxed jam that resulted in a few bug fixes for our asset, a big win for us. 

Programmers: Patric Keisala, Andreas Ingeholm

Audio: Robert Bibb @BibbSound
